project.name: Podlove
project.description: Podlove is an initiative to improve the overall technical infrastructure for podcasting. Podlove is both an network for developers to discuss features and agree on standards as well as an incubator for software and file formats under the Podlove name.

applicant.name: Alexander Heimbuch
applicant.role: Frontend Developer taking care of Podlove Web Player. Also doing administrational stuff for Podlove.
